Replace.Text: Winter
Ursus Student Union
Ursus Student Union
Provides an additional leader trait to each Ursus Student Government member
Provides an additional leader trait for Winter: "{LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_URSUS_SONYA_UA_A_NAME}": {LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_URSUS_SONYA_UA_A_DESCRIPTION}
Winter General

Each government gains an additional Military policy slot, and all your cities gain +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities.[NEWLINE] All frozen and snowy tiles provide +1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Production] Production, and frozen and snowy hill tiles provide an additional +1 [ICON_Production] Production.[NEWLINE] After unlocking "Mathematics": +10% [ICON_Science] Technology for all cities; After unlocking "Printing" and "Astronomy": +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1 [ICON_Science] for resource tiles in your territory. ]Technology; After unlocking "Electricity": +2 [ICON_Production] productivity for resource cells in the territory and provide 5 [ICON_Power] electricity to all cities[NEWLINE]After unlocking "Military Training" and "Defense Tactics": +10% [ICON_Production] productivity and [ICON_Food] food for all cities; After unlocking "Humanism": +1 [ICON_Culture] culture for frozen soil and snowfield cells; After unlocking "Mobilization": +2 [ICON_Production] productivity for frozen soil and snowfield cells and +50% [ICON_Production] productivity for city-produced land melee units
Ursus Battle Cry

+12 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength to all units; gain [ICON_Science] and [ICON_Culture] equal to the combat strength of the killed unit by killing the unit (in standard mode) [NEWLINE] Provide a special governor: [NEWLINE] Ursus Student Autonomous Group member Zhenli (The book has its own beauty)
Ursus Student Union
Ursus Student Union
Club notice board

A special piece of furniture that belongs to the Ursus Student Activity Room.[NEWLINE]Provides +2[ICON_Science] Science, +2[ICON_Culture] Culture, +1[ICON_Food] Food, +1[ICON_Amenities] Amenities, +1[ICON_Housing] Housing, +1[ICON_Citizen] Citizen Slot[NEWLINE](Hanging student club notice board. Most of the items are insignificant and visible to everyone)
Floor-standing bookshelf

A special piece of furniture, belonging to the Ursus Student Activity Room [NEWLINE] After construction, it will give [ICON_RESOURCE_BOOK_LIST] a list of books on truth, an exclusive luxury resource [NEWLINE] providing +2 [ICON_Culture] culture, +1 [ICON_Amenities] livability, +1 [ICON_Housing] housing, +1 [ICON_Citizen] citizen slot [NEWLINE] and provide +3 book slots [NEWLINE] (a floor-to-ceiling bookshelf full of notices and slogans. In order to correct everyone's wrong habits, some popular books are placed behind the signs)
Portable picnic stove

A special piece of furniture, belonging to the Ursus Student Activity Room [NEWLINE] After construction, give [ICON_RESOURCE_HONEY_PIE] Honey Pie Gift Pack, an exclusive luxury resource [NEWLINE] Provides +3 [ICON_Food] Food, +2 [ICON_Production] Productivity, +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity, +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing, +1 [ICON_Citizen] Citizen Slot [NEWLINE] (A picnic stove that can be used at any time, please pay attention to safety when using it indoors. It is for Gumi's own use only, and it is strictly forbidden to borrow it)
Ursus Student Activity Room

Replaces the barracks, initially unlocked, can be built near the city center[NEWLINE]Basically provides +5[ICON_Housing] housing, +3[ICON_Food] food, each of which provides +2[ICON_Science] technology[NEWLINE]Each adjacent area, +1[ICON_Culture] culture and +1[ICON_Production] productivity; and obtains different bonuses according to the area type[NEWLINE]At the same time, cells adjacent to the Ursus student activity room gain +1[ICON_Culture] culture[NEWLINE]Each turn gives +1[ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General, [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist and [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician point[NEWLINE] (The activity room was built by five Ursus students with their wages, and a handshake is just the beginning of friendship)
Early Dew
Provides an additional leader trait for Zao Lu: "{LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_URSUS_ROSTOVA_UA_A_XP1_NAME}": {LOC_TRAIT_LEADER_URSUS_ROSTOVA_UA_A_XP1_DESCRIPTION}
Student Union President

+2 [ICON_Gold] coins to all strategic resources and luxury resources, and reduce the cost of buying buildings with coins by 25% [NEWLINE] After unlocking political philosophy, you gain an additional diplomacy slot and 5 additional [ICON_GRANT_INFLUENCE_TOKEN] influence points each turn [NEWLINE] +3 [ICON_Gold] coins and +1 [ICON_Science] technology to your international trade routes, and each specialized area at the destination provides an additional +1 [ICON_Science] technology, +2[ICON_Gold] Gold[NEWLINE] +2[ICON_Food] Food, +1[ICON_Culture] Culture for your domestic trade routes, each specialized region at the destination provides an additional +1[ICON_Culture] Culture, +1[ICON_Gold] Gold[NEWLINE] Reduce the cost of buying merchants by 25% and gain an additional [ICON_VIEW_TRADE] trade route after unlocking "Foreign Trade", "Guilds", "Merchantilism", "Currency", "Banking" and "Economy"
Snowfall Morning Heart

This feature will gain more effects as technology is developed.[NEWLINE]Deep into the Marrow (initial):[NEWLINE]Adds an additional +6[ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting against cities, siege units, and heavy cavalry units. At the same time, all ranged units deal full damage to city walls, and there is no attack power penalty when making ranged attacks on cities.[NEWLINE]Split Shot (obtained after unlocking "Mechanics" and "Military Engineering"):[NEWLINE]Adds +3[ICON_Strength] combat strength to all units, and all ranged units can[ICON_Range] an additional attack.[NEWLINE]Avalanche Strike (obtained after unlocking "Metal Casting"):[NEWLINE]Adds an additional +6[ICON_Strength] combat strength, +1 range and +1 vision to all ranged units, and allows all ranged units to learn area control.
Student Union President

+2 [ICON_Gold] coins to all strategic resources and luxury resources, and reduce the cost of buying buildings with coins by 25% [NEWLINE] After unlocking political philosophy, you gain an additional diplomacy slot and 5 additional [ICON_GRANT_INFLUENCE_TOKEN] influence points each turn [NEWLINE] +3 [ICON_Gold] coins and +1 [ICON_Science] technology to your international trade routes, and each specialized area at the destination provides an additional +1 [ICON_Science] technology, +2[ICON_Gold] Gold[NEWLINE] +2[ICON_Food] Food, +1[ICON_Culture] Culture for your domestic trade routes, each specialized region at the destination provides an additional +1[ICON_Culture] Culture, +1[ICON_Gold] Gold[NEWLINE] Reduce the cost of buying merchants by 25% and gain an additional [ICON_VIEW_TRADE] trade route after unlocking "Foreign Trade", "Guilds", "Merchantilism", "Currency", "Banking" and "Economy"

There are five members of the Ursus Student Autonomous Group, all of whom are students of a local middle school in Chernobyl. When Chernobyl fell and the Reunion Movement launched a large-scale purge of the entire city, Winter gathered some of the surviving students and carried out self-defense, assistance and escape operations in the name of the "Student Autonomous Group". After a series of adventures and disputes, this student autonomous group defected to Rhodes Island.

Before the Chernobyl incident, this large city of Ursus gathered most of the talents of the Ursus Empire, and there were many colleges and universities. Whether it was the "useful talents" who would be the future of the empire or the "rebels" who would renovate the empire, most of them gathered here.

Winter is the student leader of a middle school in Che City. After wiping out all the clubs around the campus, his prestige has greatly increased. He is known as "General Winter" and is well-known throughout Che City.

Zao Lu was a student in a middle school in Chernobog before the Chernobog Incident and served as the student council president. At the same time, his family, the Rostov family, was one of the new nobles that emerged after the great rebellion. They were originally just retainers of a certain count, but they got everything that originally belonged to the count, and then ran a business in Chernobog, either overtly or covertly.

Mobile city-states like Chernobog often have warnings of natural disasters, but this does not eliminate the enthusiasm of students in Chernobog and even the entire Ursus for fighting and the future. However, what these students could not imagine is that a large mobile city like Chernobog was not destroyed by natural disasters, but by man-made disasters.
The leader character of this module comes from the game "Arknights" produced by Hypergryph Network, and some of the art materials of the game are used.
Ursus
Small Student Self-Government Association
Five people
Chernobyl
{LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_URSUS_SONYA_LEADER_SUBTITLE}
Okay, I'm here to help. Tell me, who do you want to hit next?
Did you have anything to say just now? I didn't hear you because I was wearing headphones
Winter, head of the Ursus Student Union. I don't care what happens to me, but my companions need a place to stay or some help.
Not bad, I don't care whether I'm the captain or a member of the team
Why do I stare at you all the time? I just want to see what you do every day
If you are in a hurry to die, come to me. You don't need to queue here.
strength and honor! victory or death!
Hmm...
Not bad
trouble
You are the one in charge, right? Don't say too much, just come with me for a walk
What are you doing? Something wrong?
Shame on you! Get out of this battlefield right now! [NEWLINE] (Condemn you)
Winter, head of the Ursus Student Autonomous Group.
You're pretty good.
It seems we are not far away
Boring, leaving
Good results
(Winter's favorability towards you has increased)
coward
(Winter's favorability towards you has decreased)
Come on, let's fight together
snort!
What are you afraid of? Keep fighting!
It doesn't matter
It doesn't matter
This land is ours now, don't even think about it.
Borrow
Is that all you can do?
Okay, get me some work, I know life here isn't free.
What are you doing? Is there something wrong?
Chernobyl? Who wants to go back to a city without hope? Let's talk about your hometown. [NEWLINE] (Swap capital city)
Winter

Winter, who was a student at a middle school in Chernobog before the Chernobog Incident, showed her passion for combat and assaults during her time at school. [NEWLINE] She showed the Ursus' innate strength and solid physique in many tests, and is now the leader of the combat team as a vanguard operator. [NEWLINE]Operator Winter is different from the general impression of Ursus, who are irritable and sensitive. She speaks her mind, but she does not fail to consider the impact of what she says.
A strip of cloth torn from a red flag. For some reason, when I tied it around my arm, I couldn't help but feel sad.

Winter, before the Chernobyl Incident, he was a student at a middle school in Chernobyl. During his time at school, he showed his passion for combat and assault. In many tests, he showed the inherent strength and solid physique of Ursus people. He is now the leader of the combat team as a pioneer operator.

Operator Winter is different from the general impression of Ursus, who are irritable and sensitive. She speaks her mind, but she does not fail to consider the impact of her words. It is certain that Winter's words and actions are the result of her judgment of "feasibility". But even so, once Winter thinks that her companions are being wronged and bullied, she will stand up for them without asking why.

Therefore, it is not recommended to regard some of the remarks made by Operator Winter as a joke by young people. We should be flexible in dealing with young operators. At present, it can be judged that Operator Mari's remarks will have a certain inhibitory effect on Winter. We should maintain communication with Mari, and at the same time make Winter feel that Rhodes Island and her mutual interests are consistent.

Winter was born in Chernobyl, Ursus Empire. Observation reports indicate that student self-organized associations are a popular form of organization among young people in Ursus in recent years. Influenced by the "new culture" flowing in from countries such as Victoria and Columbia, they are immersed in rock, beer and group fights all day long.

The leader of each student club has his or her own nickname. Winter's original nickname was "Winter", which was given by the leader of the East Campus club she defeated, while the people of another club called her "General" (a nickname secretly teasing. In Ursus' jokes, "General" is equivalent to incompetence and deception). But after Winter successively wiped out all the student clubs around the campus, people began to merge the two nicknames and called her "Генерал Мороз" (common language means "Winter General").

Obviously, the Ursus students who survived the Chernobyl Incident are currently gathering into a loose group called the "Ursus Student Autonomous Group" with Winter as the center. According to the descriptions provided by some operators, Ursus students often use the dormitory room of Operator Victory as a gathering place, calling it "класс" (common language means "class" or "class"). In consideration of the internal stability of Rhodes Island, it is recommended to conduct regular observations of the group's daily actions.
Winter can gain an advantage in battle, use her characteristics, and suppress others. At the same time, Truth can also give some reference opinions, and her words should not be ignored.

By making use of the Ursus Warcry of Winter, all military units will be strengthened. Defeating the enemy in the early stage can quickly develop [ICON_Science] technology and [ICON_Culture] civics. At the same time, Truth as a Political Commissar (crossed out) can give a large amount of [ICON_Culture] cultural bonuses and provide a large amount of bonuses to a city. Using the large amount of housing and output provided by the Ursus Student Activity Room, plan strategies to defeat the opponent and win.
{LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_URSUS_SONYA_LEADER_QUOTE}
Society leader
Once Winter thinks that his companions are being wronged or bullied, he will stand up for them without asking why.
+12 Ursus Warcry
{LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_URSUS_ROSTOVA_LEADER_SUBTITLE}
It's my honor to help you
Feel sorry
Please let me take care of whatever job you can do, and please take care of Rin Dong and the others' mental state.
OK, let me express my gratitude to you.
Phew, relax, relax.
Zaolu, believe in yourself, you can do it.
Although we have no grudges against each other...
Hey, is there something wrong?
Doctor, I'm sorry if I tried harder...
Nice to see you
Thanks, but we don't need it for now.
There are still many things I don't understand about myself. The more I think about it, the more I don't understand. So, I would like to ask you for advice.
Eh?!
(Condemn you)
Gui'an, the Ursus Student Autonomous Group was revealed early.
You're pretty good.
Then, we are “neighbors”
Gui'an
Thank you again
(Zaolu's affection for you has increased)
Huh?
(Zhaolu's favor towards you has decreased)
It seems that the experience I accumulated in the student union is still applicable to adult work, which is really the best thing.
War is not necessary
I remember those days... Let the war end
certainly
certainly
Could you please move a little further away from me? Thank you
Can you let me pass through here?
Could you please move a little further away from me? Thank you
Everyone, remember to follow the plan
If I wanted something before, I could get it, but now I know that there are some things that I can never get.
I wonder if there is a place like a salon. [NEWLINE] (Switch the capital city position)
+6 Deep into the bone marrow
+6 Deep into the bone marrow
+3 Split Shot
+6 Avalanche
Early Dew

Zaolu, before the Chernobog Incident, attended a middle school in Chernobog and served as the student council president (a pure-blooded lady of a fallen noble family) [NEWLINE] After the incident, she joined Rhodes Island and was assigned to the logistics department. She had a very good reputation during her work. Now, upon her application, she is transferred to the front line as a sniper operator. [NEWLINE] Zaolu quickly integrated into the life of Rhodes Island. To her, identity seemed to be the most indifferent thing. In the eyes of most operators, she was just a polite girl. [NEWLINE] But whether at work or in social occasions, she showed a maturity that was inconsistent with her age. [NEWLINE]
A paper cutter. She handed it to you solemnly, but you didn't know why.

In the past, the great nobles could enjoy a stable prosperity by relying on their bloodline, but in modern times, their status was challenged by the emerging business and political elites. In some countries, such as Colombia, the status of well-known companies is almost equivalent to the bloodline of other countries. Of course, a small noble is not as rich as the general manager of a Colombian company. Industry and commerce continue to develop, and many visionary nobles are trying to transform their land and entourage into capital. However, in more classical countries, such as Ursus, such a transformation is slow and painful. At least before the great rebellion, the great nobles still held most of the right to speak. If it were not for that accident, the political structure of Ursus might not have changed at all.

According to Zaolu's description, the Rostov family she belonged to was one of the new nobles that emerged after the Great Rebellion. They were originally just followers of a certain count, but they got everything that originally belonged to the count. Count Boris, the mayor of Chernobog, was also one of the new nobles. The two families hit it off and ran businesses in Chernobog, either overt or covert, which gave her family a high status in Chernobog. Of course, all this was wiped out with the destruction of Chernobog.

After escaping from school during the Chernobog Incident, they survived for quite some time in Chernobog, which had become a half-abandoned city, until Rhodes Island rescued them in a humanitarian aid campaign secured by Amiya. These things sound so horrifying that one would doubt the authenticity of what she said at first, but there are some key points in her description:

They were imprisoned in Peterheim High School two days after the Reunion Movement had basically completely controlled Chernobyl, which coincides with the time when the Reunion Movement began to take action in the known Chernobyl incident; During his control of the school, Mephisto did not interfere with the students' actions at all, but did not allow any students to leave the school. From an observer's perspective, his purpose was obviously to brew students' unrest, and this bad behavior was consistent with our understanding of him;

The time when the Reunion Movement relaxed its control over the school also coincided with the time when Amiya encountered Mephisto during the process of rescuing the doctor. It is reasonable to think that Mephisto received information from Rhodes Island and left, and since the tragedy could not be prevented at this time, he saw what he wanted to see, so he relaxed his control over the school.

The Peterheim High School she mentioned does exist in Chernobyl, and is close to where they were rescued, and is in an area that was not directly hit by the natural disaster. And so on and so forth. Considering various factors, we can only believe that in such a tragic event as the Chernobyl incident, there is actually such a scene.

As for the experiences of other members of the Autonomous Group in this tragedy, Zaolu said that she did not know much about it because she joined the Autonomous Group relatively late, and she made it clear that she would not tell the part she knew. She took the initiative to tell these experiences, on the one hand, because she trusts Rhodes Island and the Doctor, and on the other hand, because she thinks that she is probably the most suitable person to be a "traitor" in the Autonomous Group and tell these things, and she hopes that the Doctor can do the one thing she cannot do - help her companions.

As the student council president and a member of the Rostov family, Zaolu has learned a lot about adult society. Use Zaolu's excellent diplomatic and business skills to gain more advantages in city-state competition and commercial wars. At the same time, after training in Rhodes Island, Zaolu's performance on the battlefield has become more and more outstanding. Use trade gaps and city-states to gain [ICON_Science] technology or [ICON_Culture] cultural victory. If necessary, use force to gain conquest victory.

Zaolu can make some resources gain more [ICON_Gold] gold coins, and there are discounts for purchasing buildings, so that the city can focus on building areas and projects. At the same time, thanks to Zaolu's experience as the president of the Student Union, Zaolu also has certain means in diplomacy, which can gain the trust of the city-state more quickly. At the same time, with the research and development of [ICON_Science] technology and [ICON_Culture] municipal administration, more [ICON_VIEW_TRADE] trade routes can be obtained. At the same time, Zaolu can also provide a lot of bonuses for ranged units. Thanks to this, conquering victory has also become an optional option. You can open up the trade route first, and then use the range and vision of the ranged units to completely control the battlefield.
{LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_URSUS_ROSTOVA_LEADER_QUOTE}

Zhenli, before the Chernobyl Incident, was a student at a middle school in Checheng. During her time at school, she wrote articles for many magazines related to Originium Arts. Knowledge areas: famous works, mystery literature, and sociology journals.

The Four Demons

If the city has at least four specialized areas, each area provides +2% [ICON_Science] Science, +2% [ICON_Culture] Culture, +2% [ICON_Food] Food, +2% [ICON_Gold] Gold, and +2% [ICON_Production] Production to the city.
Five Little Pigs
